data.actual_result: It uses a different and unusual font
data.expected_result: Should use the same font as anywhere else in the app (like server list, quick switcher or server settings)
data.short_description: Letters of pictureless servers in Mutual Servers have unusual font
data.steps_to_repro: - Share a pictureless server with someone - View this person's profile - Navigate to Mutual Servers tab - Observe font
